title: Tech Support

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Assist someone with their tech problems at night
-Aquire a user’s login information (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your target will gain immunity from anything that would cause their ability to stop working, and they gain all immunities from tech related roles (like mainframe and androids)
-When you acquire someone’s computer login info, the host will send you a number that is twice the digits of your target’s post number. At least half of these numbers must contain the numbers to the actual post (example: Post 436 is targeted. Tech Support gains the numbers 742396. The numbers do not have to be in order)

desc:
Post 3220
_Hello, I have found virus on your computer_
